title: Yorktown Battlefield Part of Colonial National Historical Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education      Classroom Enrichment Programs: Designed from Virginia's Standards of Learning (SOLs) requirements, Colonial National Historical Park offers educational programs on the historic site to enhance your students' academic experiences. Student participation is encouraged through use of the inquiry method and hands-on activities. Programs can be reserved on weekdays from October through May. There is a $30.00 interpretive fee for each program. To ensure a program for your class, please call at least two months and no more than five months in advance.All reservations must be made in advance. To arrange a program, call  the Program Support Specialist (757) 898-2411 Monday through Friday. Yorktown Educational Programs      Â    Entrance Fee Waivers
